( Reuters)- Chrysler is working to refinance what its chief executive characterized as`` shyster loans'' that the Barack Obama administration extended as part of a bailout to keep the automaker from collapse in 2009. I want to pay back the shyster loans, Sergio Marchionne said at an industry conference, using a derogatory term for an unprincipled lawyer or politician.`` Pay back the loans, get those out and then take( the company) public.''
